[Answer]
answer: The AI discovered a revolutionary synthesis route using a phosphorus-based catalyst, achieving an addition rate of over 99.5% and high molecular weight.
pred: ether can only be synthesized by CB or oDCB, but AI found a revolutionary synthesis route using a reactive metal, such as Ag or its analogues, in the presence of sulfuric acid.
